items.sentence: Come over here and warm yourself by the fire.
Could I have a moment alone with Tom, please?
You\'re a bit younger than I am, aren\'t you?
You\'re a lot older than Tom is, aren\'t you?
You\'re a lot younger than I am, aren\'t you?
I hate to say this, but I think Tom is right.
Tom didn\'t let his children go out at night.
Tom didn\'t need to use the knife I lent him.
Tom read every book in his school\'s library.
Tom said Mary could\'ve done that by herself.
I don\'t think Tom is the one who needs help.
I don\'t think Tom really meant what he said.
I don\'t think I would\'ve gone there by car.
I don\'t think I\'ve ever seen Tom with Mary.
We\'ll begin a systematic search of the town.
I can\'t stand people who yell at their kids.
Tom\'s not at all sure who he should talk to.
You\'re sitting in Tom\'s chair, aren\'t you?
You shouldn\'t speak French in the classroom.
You told Tom to go to bed early, didn\'t you?
